function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of embracement of protective behaviors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fear, worry, and psychological tension related to covid-19 may lead to negative emotional responses.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent or untrustworthy government communication may lead to public frustration and non-acceptance of advice during a health crisis.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible transmission of contagious diseases due to close contact and social interaction","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elevated fear and anxiety leading to mental health problems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased engagement in protective behaviors due to negative emotional response","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Biased risk perception due to uncertainty about covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the new disease covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about covid-19 symptoms and transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Downplaying the risk of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding as a major obstacle to public compliance with emergency response measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of appropriate knowledge as a prerequisite for the public to take action","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bias in data collection due to online survey","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete questionnaire submissions","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Logic errors in returned questionnaires","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in governmental policies and public behaviors","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to protective behaviors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quarantine and isolation measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited attention to public responses to the government’s actions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dearth of literature documenting public protective behaviors in china","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Late endorsement of face mask usage in the us and some european countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of preventive measures such as social distancing, hand hygiene, and wearing face masks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Circulation of contagious diseases due to large public events","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Healthcare leadership and capacity under strain","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for food products leading to panic buying","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of restaurants and cafes leading to job losses and risk of permanent closure","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased domestic violence due to lockdown measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic-buying and stockpiling of food products","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for food products","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient distribution and delivery of food products","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Person-to-person transmission due to overcrowded hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of ventilators and medical supplies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in real estate transactions due to lockdown may impact confidence and lead to a financial crisis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cancellation and postponement of sports events to curb disease spread leading to financial burden","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High demand to develop a covid-19 vaccine leading to intense competition and pressure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of international travel","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Redundancy and unpaid leave for workers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impact on the hotel and tourism industry due to decreased occupancy and travel demand","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of job loss in the global travel and tourism sector","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortages of protective equipment, including n95 face masks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on pharmaceutical industry and supply chain","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in healthcare access due to overwhelmed risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate testing and monitoring of asymptomatic healthcare workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Government financial support activity, potentially leading to a higher risk of disease transmission in the community.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
